control.name: Control
control.description: Gain control of the target until the start of your next turn
control.effect: You can force them to take any actions available to them including attacking or stunning themselves until the control ends. Targets add 1/5th of their remaining HP to the Resistance Score against this attack.

stun.name: Stun
stun.description: The target cannot act on their turn
stun.effect: Their Avoidance is considered 0, all attacks that hit them are automatic critical attack rolls. Targets add 1/5th of their remaining HP to the Resistance Score against this attack.

weaken.name: Weaken
weaken.description: Reduce one of the targets stats by 2 times your Tier
weaken.effect: Reduce one of the targets stats, chosen when you build this attack, by 2 times your Tier until the end of your next turn.

brawl.name: Brawl
brawl.description: Push, knockdown, or grab the target
brawl.effect: Push your target up to 3 times your Tier spaces (collision damage), knock them Prone (melee gets extra Tier), or Grab them (prevents movement).

frighten.name: Frighten
frighten.description: The target moves away from you as quickly as it can
frighten.effect: The target spends its turn moving away from you as quickly as it can until the end of your next turn.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: The target must include you in any attacks it makes
taunt.effect: The target must include you in any attacks it makes until the end of your next turn.

charm.name: Charm
charm.effect: The target cannot attack you until the end of your next turn.
